name: Spell Mastery, Mythic

sections.body: You can prepare spells you have selected with Spell Mastery as a full-round action. You must spend the appropriate amount of time preparing other spells you have not mastered. As a full-round action, you can expend one use of mythic power to prepare all your spells that you have selected with Spell Mastery.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You're so familiar with certain spells you can prepare them with the greatest of ease.
